    Introduction to ngstools

    Diego Diez

    2017-05-02

    library(ngstools)

    phred tools

    f <- system.file("files/example_1.fastq.gz", package = "ngstools")
get_phred(f)
    ##     phred
## 1 phred33
##                                                                                           filename
## 1 /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/3.4/Resources/library/ngstools/files/example_1.fastq.gz
